sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"特性，特点，品质"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: quality, property, feature, characteristic, peculiarity, trait, attribute, character
means: quality ： 最普通用词，既可指有形或无形的特性，又可指个性或共性的特征。
property ： 多指同类事物所共有的特性，一般不用于指人。
feature ： 指事物突出引人注目的特点。多用来说明人的容貌特征或地理特征。
characteristic ： 指某人或某物天生有别于他人或他物的内部特质或外表特征。
peculiarity ： 指人或事物独具的或奇怪的特点，常带感情色彩。
trait ： 多指人的性格、心情的特征，尤指先天秉赋的持久的行为模式或性格特征。
attribute ： 通常指人主观赋予某事物的属性，可指典型事物。
character ： 多指一类人或事物所具有的独特的典型的特征。

word_mean: 性质，质量，质。在放射学中指某种型式的电离辐射穿透物质的能力

sentence.Network_en: Buying budget-priced furniture needn't mean compromising on quality or style.
sentence.Network_cn: 买价钱经济的家具并不意味着就要牺牲质量和样式。

sentence.Network_en: Today's organic wine producer is typically a small, quality-conscious family concern.
sentence.Network_cn: 现今的有机葡萄酒生产商一般是注重品质的小型家族企业.

sentence.Network_en: Little of the existing housing is of good enough quality.
sentence.Network_cn: 现有的住房几乎少有质量过关的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the senses 'character, disposition' and 'particular property or feature'): from Old French qualite, from Latin qualitas (translating Greek poiotēs), from qualis 'of what kind, of such a kind'

entry.def: The quality of something is how good or bad it is.

example.ex: Everyone can greatly improve the quality of life...
example.tran: 每个人都可以大大改善生活质量。

example.ex: Other services vary dramatically in quality.
example.tran: 其他服务在质量上差别很大。

entry.def: Something of quality is of a high standard.

example.ex: In our work, quality is paramount.
example.tran: 我们的工作追求品质至上。

entry.def: Someone's qualities are the good characteristics that they have which are part of their nature.

example.ex: Sometimes you wonder where your kids get their good qualities...
example.tran: 有时你会想，孩子们身上的优秀品质是从何而来呢？

example.ex: He wanted to introduce mature people with leadership qualities...
example.tran: 他想引进具有领导素质的成熟人才。

entry.def: You can describe a particular characteristic of a person or thing as a quality .

example.tran: 这首诗浮夸造作的特点

entry.def: The quality papers or the quality press are the more serious newspapers which give detailed accounts of world events, as well as reports on business, culture, and society.

example.ex: Even the quality papers agreed that it was a triumph.
example.tran: 即使是内容严肃的报纸也认为这是一次胜利。

means.word_mean: 1. an essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone;

sentences.sentence: "the quality of mercy is not strained"--Shakespeare

means.word_mean: 2. a degree or grade of excellence or worth;
3. a characteristic property that defines the apparent individual nature of something;

sentences.sentence: "each town has a quality all its own"

means.word_mean: 4. (music) the distinctive property of a complex sound (a voice or noise or musical sound);

sentences.sentence: "the timbre of her soprano was rich and lovely"
"the muffled tones of the broken bell summoned them to meet"

list.explanation: (黑社会用语)直心直肚肠的男人，思想单纯的男子

example.en: These quality Joes just don't understand how it is on the street.
example.zh: 这些思想单纯的汉子就是不明白现实是个什么样。

auth_sentence.content: Our enthusiasm did lift but the quality didn't.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our enthusiasm did lift but the quality didn't.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our enthusiasm did lift but the quality didn't.

auth_sentence.content: The first pressing gives oil of the highest quality.
auth_sentence.res_content: The first pressing gives oil of the highest quality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first pressing gives oil of the highest quality.

auth_sentence.content: Music making of this quality is all too rare.
auth_sentence.res_content: Music making of this quality is all too rare.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Music making of this quality is all too rare.

stems_affixes.word_buile: qualify[v.[使]具有资格, 证明合格, 限制修饰 v.限制, 限定]+ed表形容词→qualified有资格的
quality性质+ative表形容词→qualitative性质上的, 定性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 质量, 品质, 性质

Sentence.sentence: The quality of education to receive.
They value the environmental quality they preserve over their oil imports from abroad
The movies were widely predicted to drive live theater out of the marketplace, but they didn't, because theater turned out to have qualities movies could not reproduce.
Those qualities that make interaction with other people enjoyable would be simulated as closely as possible, and the machine would appear to be charming stimulating, and easygoing
Those qualities that make interaction with other people enjoyable would be simulated as closely as possible, and the machine would appear to be charming, stimulating, and easygoing
In 1961, when President Kennedy declared that America would send a man to the moon by the decade's end, those words, too, had a dreamlike quality.

sentences.en: These are leather goods of high quality.
sentences.cn: 这些是高质量的皮革制品。

sentences.en: He possesses the quality of inspiring confidence.
sentences.cn: 他有本事能让别人信任他。

means.word_mean: 品质, 特征, 特性

sentences.cn: 同情心是他最好的品质。

sentences.en: Decision is a quality requisite to a commander.
sentences.cn: 决断是指挥员必须具备的品质。

sentences.en: One quality of this kind of timber is that it can be sawn easily.
sentences.cn: 这种木料的一个特点是容易锯开。

jushi.english: We never use second quality ingredients.
jushi.chinese: 我们绝不使用次等配料。

jushi.english: I am sixty-and-five, and I have knocked about in the world and tasted the quality of life.
jushi.chinese: 我六十有五,在世界各地漫游过,饱经人间的坎坷。

jushi.english: The quality of this suit is not quite consonant with its price.
jushi.chinese: 这套衣服的质量与价钱不太相符。
